title: The Biggest Takeaways From Round 1 of the NFL Draft | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Round 1 of the very first remote NFL draft is in the books, and we break down all of the most intriguing events of the night, including Tua Tagovailoa going fifth to the Dolphins, Justin Herbert going sixth to the Chargers, Jordan Love being Aaron Rodgers's backup, Kliff Kingsbury’s flex of an at-home draft office, and much more.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Mallory Rubin

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
